answers.answer: Hi, herbal medicines could be safe. But to tell confirmatorily scientific studies need to be done on them to study the long term effects also, in the absence of which it is difficult to comment. No scientific studies have been done. Regards.

question: I AM 67 YEARS OLD DIABETES PATIENT PAST 30 YEARS.  I AM ALSO A HEART PATIENT AS WELL AS KIDNEY.  TWO YEARS BEFORE I HAD UNDERGONE BYPASS SURGERY IN INDIA.  I AM TAKING INSULIN AND LOT OF ALLOPATHIC MEDICINES FOR THE SAID COMPLICATIONS .   IN ADDITION TO THE ABOVE,  I AM TAKING CERTAIN HERBAL MEDICINES:  IT IS MY DOUBT CAN I TAKE ALLOPATHIC MEDICINES AS WELL AS HIMALAYA HERBAL MEDICINES SIMULTANEOUSLY?  IS IT HARM TO MY HEALTH?  I ASKED THIS DOUBT WITH HIMALAYA HERBAL HEALTH CARE CENTRE. THEY HAVE INFORMED ME THAT THEIR HERBAL MEDICINES ARE QUITE SAFE AND DOES NOT HAVE ANY SIDE AFFECT AND CONTINUE THEIR PRODUCTS ON REGULAR BASIS. PL CLARIFY.YOUR IMMEDIATE  RESPONSE  IN THIS REGARD WOULD BE HIGHLY APPRECIATED.THANK YOU,
title: Allopathic and Herbal medicines certain doubt
